entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 29.
